SELECT t.* FROM jeegem_BASE_POSITION t WHERE 1=1

ORDER BY t.createTime

SELECT t.* FROM jeegem_BASE_POSITION t WHERE 1=1
AND (t.name like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') )
AND t.orgId IN (${param.allOrgIds})
ORDER BY t.createTime
SELECT count(*) FROM jeegem_BASE_POSITION t WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE jeegem_BASE_POSITION SET name =#{name}, orgId =#{orgId}, type =#{type}, description=#{description}, updateTime =#{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT jbo.id, jbo.pId, CONCAT('组织:',jbo.name) as name, 'o' as other FROM jeegem_BASE_ORG jbo UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('pos',jbp.id) as id, jbp.orgId as pId, CONCAT('职务:',jbp.name) as name, 'p' as other FROM jeegem_BASE_POSITION jbp
SELECT t.id as id, t.name as name, t.pId as pId FROM jeegem_BASE_ORG t ORDER BY t.id,t.name

SELECT jba.id,jba.loginName,jba.name,jba.roleId,jbr.name as roleName,jba.description FROM jeegem_BASE_ACCOUNT jba LEFT JOIN jeegem_BASE_ROLE jbr ON jbr.id=jba.roleId WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT jbap.accountId FROM jeegem_BASE_ACCOUNT_POSITION jbap WHERE jba.id=jbap.accountId AND jbap.posId=#{param.id} )
AND (jba.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') OR jba.loginName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%'))
ORDER BY jba.createTime

SELECT jba.id,jba.loginName,jba.name,jba.roleId,jbr.name as roleName,jba.description FROM jeegem_BASE_ACCOUNT jba LEFT JOIN jeegem_BASE_ROLE jbr ON jbr.id=jba.roleId WHERE 1=1
AND (jba.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%') OR jba.loginName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param.keyWord},'%'))
AND EXISTS (SELECT jbap.accountId FROM jeegem_BASE_ACCOUNT_POSITION jbap WHERE jba.id=jbap.accountId AND jbap.posId=#{param.id} ) ORDER BY jba.createTime
SELECT t.* FROM jeegem_BASE_POSITION t WHERE t.orgId=#{orgId}
